price: 40. Celui (Qui a pu faire cela) ne serait-il pas Capable de faire revivre les morts ?
arabic: أَلَيۡسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alaysa dhālika biqādirin ʿalā an yuḥ'yiya al-mawtā
